definitions.body: welfare, prosperity: [[כעב]] [[עברה ישׁעתי]] Job 30:15 as a cloud my prosperity passed away.
deliverance: [[והיתה לי לישׁועה]] and thou wilt be to me for deliverance 2Sa 10:11 = 1Ch 19:12.

salvation by God, primarily from external evils, but often with added spiritual idea: Ge 49:18 (poem), Is 33:2, Is 52:7, Is 52:10, Is 59:11, Is 60:18, Jon 2:10, Ps 3:3, Ps 3:9, Ps 14:7 = Ps 53:6, Ps 22:2, Ps 35:3, Ps 62:2, Ps 69:30, Ps 70:5 ( = [[תשׁועה]] Ps 40:17), Ps 78:22, Ps 80:3, Ps 91:16, Ps 96:2 = 1Ch 16:23, 1Ch 106:4, 1Ch 140:8, Job 13:16; with verbs of rejoicing [[בישׁועה]] 1Sa 2:1, Is 25:9, Ps 9:15, Ps 13:6, Ps 35:9; [[יְשׁועָה יׇשִׁית]] [[חוֹמוֹת]] Is 26:1 salvation will he set as walls; cf. phr. ´[[אֱלֽהֵי ישׁ]] Ps 88:2, ´[[אֵל ישׁ]] Is 12:2, ´[[חוּר ישׁ]] De 32:15 (song), Ps 89:27, cf. [[חוּרִי וְישׁוּעָתִי]] Ps 62:3, Ps 62:7; ´[[ישׁ]] Is 49:8; ´[[מַעַיְנֵי הישׁ]] Is 12:3 wells of salvation; pl. [[יְשׁוּעוֹת]] (intensive), of ´[[י]]:[[יְשׁוּעוֹת פָּנַי ]] Ps 42:6; the salvation of my face (person; [[פניו]] MT error, [[פני]] LXX SyrVer), v:Ps 42:11, Ps 43:5; [[כּוֹס ישׁועות]] Ps 116:13 cup commemorating saving acts (of drink-offering); further Ps 119:123, Ps 119:155, Ps 119:166, Ps 119:174; ‖[[חְדָקָה]] Is 51:6, Is 51:8, Is 56:1, Is 62:1, Ps 98:2, Ps 98:3; [[יְשׁוּעָתִי עַד־קְחֵה]] [[הָאָרֶץ]] Is 49:6 my salvation unto the ends of the earth; [[בְּכָלאגּוֹיִם יְשׁוּעָתְֶָ]] Ps 67:3 among all nations thy salvation.

victory: c.
